title: Random segfaults
body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

I keep getting segfaults from rustc with different reasons each time. I can't replicate them since the next run always completes successfully. 
Has been happening for about a few weeks. At first, I thought my system isn't stable but I now I don't think that's the case.
The latest error message was the following but it keeps changing. I would add more as I encounter them. 
```
error: could not compile `idna`

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name idna --edition=2018 /home/pranay/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/idna-0.2.3/src/lib.rs --error-format=json --json=diagnostic-rendered-ansi,artifacts --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,metadata,link -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C metadata=a6817081c64bae8f -C extra-filename=-a6817081c64bae8f --out-dir /home/pranay/wd/warp-graphql/target/debug/deps -L dependency=/home/pranay/wd/warp-graphql/target/debug/deps --extern matches=/home/pranay/wd/warp-graphql/target/debug/deps/libmatches-9cfb84f2ef24c6e0.rmeta --extern unicode_bidi=/home/pranay/wd/warp-graphql/target/debug/deps/libunicode_bidi-afe326ebf8dbe853.rmeta --extern unicode_normalization=/home/pranay/wd/warp-graphql/target/debug/deps/libunicode_normalization-9937e5bde6b792fd.rmeta --cap-lints allow` (signal: 11, SIGSEGV: invalid memory reference)
```
### Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.55.0-beta.2 (3c216f01c 2021-07-29)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 3c216f01c7be6a01cfca069eee62ef3c72d9fd3a
commit-date: 2021-07-29
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.55.0-beta.2
LLVM version: 12.0.1

```
(Moving to latest stable version doesn't help)
